translation: Kya tohyhi nishhi vạczh khbr ya rsvl Allah qyamtch yosh lvukn pnnyv skhtyv sintụ̄ aḥaṭh krih?
Kynhh buthụ̄ āsn tamhi doh tharymtụ̄.
Kạm krvnụ̄ th thkh vnụ̄.
Time aaczn nars andr yus skht grm chhu.
Chavnh yin tathi tamy nagh mnz yus grkan āshi.
Chhunh timn dvzkhiyan khyn mgr zhrdar knddụ̄.
Nh vytthravih suh timn, nh czlravih bochhhi.
Kynhh buthụ̄ āsn tamhi doh tr v tazh th khosh.
Pnnyn rczn ʿmln hund thvab vuchhith āsn rạẓụ̄.
Tahdyn jntn andr.
Bvzn nh tim tath jnts andr be hvdh kth.
Tth jnts mnz āshi nagah pkh vnụ̄.
Tth jnts mnz āsn thdụ̄ plng.
Byyhi āsn ābkhor czkhi thdụ̄ brvntthh kanhi thavnh āmtụ̄.
Byyhi āsn shandar shandh gndụ̄ tghi lagnh āmtụ̄.
Byyhi āsn ryshmiy qạlyn prth ṭrfh vthrnh āmtụ̄, yytns khosh krykh tatins bihn.
Kya sna vuchhan chhina yim mkkụ̄ kạfr vvuntts kun kithh pạtthụ̄ chuh pạdh krnh āmut?
Byyhi āsmans kun kithh pạtthụ̄ chhu suh blnd krnh āmut?
Byyhi kohn kun kithh pạtthụ̄ chhi tim tahavnh āmtụ̄?
Byyhi zmyns kun kithh pạtthụ̄ chhu suh vhravnh āmut?
Ps kriv tvhụ̄ nṣyḥt th vaʿẓ, tvhụ̄ chhiv nh ya rsvl Allah mgr nṣyḥt frmavvunụ̄.
Tvhụ̄ chhiv nh timn petth mslṭ krnh āmtụ̄ yuth zvrh mạnrạviyvukh.
Lykn yus aakhah buth pihri th kạfr spdi.
Ps ʿdhab kri Allah tʿālyā ts bvdd ʿdhab ạkhrts andr.
Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ aasy kun chhu vaps yun timn.
Tamhi pth chhu pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ aasy matthi timn ḥsab hyvn.
